026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.*;
029
030import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
031import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
032import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
033import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
034
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.BaseConfiguration;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Messages;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.CommentHelper;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.Utils;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder.Result;
042
043import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
044import com.sun.source.doctree.ParamTree;
045import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location;
046
047/**
048 * A taglet that represents the {@code @param} tag.
049 */
050public class ParamTaglet extends BaseTaglet implements InheritableTaglet {
051    public enum ParamKind {
052        /** Parameter of an executable element. */
053        PARAMETER,
054        /** State components of a record. */
055        RECORD_COMPONENT,
056        /** Type parameters of an executable element or type element. */
057        TYPE_PARAMETER
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Construct a ParamTaglet.
062     */
063    public ParamTaglet() {
064        super(DocTree.Kind.PARAM, false,
065            EnumSet.of(Location.TYPE, Location.CONSTRUCTOR, Location.METHOD));
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public Output inherit(Element owner, DocTree tag, boolean isFirstSentence,
070            BaseConfiguration configuration) {
071        assert owner.getKind() == ElementKind.METHOD;
072        assert tag.getKind() == DocTree.Kind.PARAM;
073        var method = (ExecutableElement) owner;
074        var param = (ParamTree) tag;
075        // find the position of an owner parameter described by the given tag
076        List<? extends Element> parameterElements;
077        if (param.isTypeParameter()) {
078            parameterElements = method.getTypeParameters();
079        } else {
080            parameterElements = method.getParameters();
081        }
082        Map<String, Integer> stringIntegerMap
083            = mapNameToPosition(configuration.utils, parameterElements);
084        CommentHelper ch = configuration.utils.getCommentHelper(owner);
085        Integer position = stringIntegerMap.get(ch.getParameterName(param));
086        if (position == null) {
087            return new Output(null, null, List.of(), true);
088        }
089        // try to inherit description of the respective parameter in an
090        // overridden method
091        try {
092            var docFinder = configuration.utils.docFinder();
093            var r = docFinder.trySearch(method,
094                m -> Result.fromOptional(extract(configuration.utils, m,
095                    position, param.isTypeParameter())))
096                .toOptional();
097            return r
098                .map(result -> new Output(result.paramTree, result.method,
099                    result.paramTree.getDescription(), true))
100                .orElseGet(() -> new Output(null, null, List.of(), true));
101        } catch (DocFinder.NoOverriddenMethodsFound e) {
102            return new Output(null, null, List.of(), false);
103        }
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * Given a list of parameter elements, returns a name-position map.
108     * @param params the list of parameters from a type or an executable member
109     * @return a name-position map
110     */
111    private static Map<String, Integer> mapNameToPosition(Utils utils,
112            List<? extends Element> params) {
113        Map<String, Integer> result = new HashMap<>();
114        int position = 0;
115        for (Element e : params) {
116            String name = utils.isTypeParameterElement(e)
117                ? utils.getTypeName(e.asType(), false)
118                : utils.getSimpleName(e);
119            result.put(name, position);
120            position++;
121        }
122        return result;
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public Content getAllBlockTagOutput(Element holder, TagletWriter writer) {
127        Utils utils = writer.configuration().utils;
128        if (utils.isExecutableElement(holder)) {
129            ExecutableElement member = (ExecutableElement) holder;
130            Content output = convertParams(member, ParamKind.TYPE_PARAMETER,
131                utils.getTypeParamTrees(member), member.getTypeParameters(),
132                writer);
133            output.add(convertParams(member, ParamKind.PARAMETER,
134                utils.getParamTrees(member), member.getParameters(), writer));
135            return output;
136        } else {
137            TypeElement typeElement = (TypeElement) holder;
138            Content output
139                = convertParams(typeElement, ParamKind.TYPE_PARAMETER,
140                    utils.getTypeParamTrees(typeElement),
141                    typeElement.getTypeParameters(), writer);
142            output.add(convertParams(typeElement, ParamKind.RECORD_COMPONENT,
143                utils.getParamTrees(typeElement),
144                typeElement.getRecordComponents(), writer));
145            return output;
146        }
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Returns a {@code Content} representation of a list of {@code ParamTree}
151     * of the specified kind.
152     *
153     * <p> This method correlates a {@code ParamTree} with a parameter
154     * {@code Element} by name. Once it's done, a particular {@code ParamTree}
155     * is addressed by the position (index) of the correlated {@code Element}
156     * in the list of parameter elements. This is needed for documentation
157     * inheritance because the corresponding parameters in the inheritance
158     * hierarchy may be named differently.
159     *
160     * <p> This method warns about {@code @param} tags that do not map to
161     * parameter elements and param tags that are duplicated. </p>
162     *
163     * @param kind the kind of <em>all</em> parameters in the lists
164     */
165    private Content convertParams(Element e,
166            ParamKind kind,
167            List<ParamTree> tags,
168            List<? extends Element> parameters,
169            TagletWriter writer) {
170        Map<Integer, ParamTree> tagOfPosition = new HashMap<>();
171        Messages messages = writer.configuration().getMessages();
172        CommentHelper ch = writer.configuration().utils.getCommentHelper(e);
173        if (!tags.isEmpty()) {
174            Map<String, Integer> positionOfName
175                = mapNameToPosition(writer.configuration().utils, parameters);
176            for (ParamTree tag : tags) {
177                String name = ch.getParameterName(tag);
178                String paramName
179                    = kind == ParamKind.TYPE_PARAMETER ? "<" + name + ">"
180                        : name;
181                if (!positionOfName.containsKey(name)) {
182                    String key = switch (kind) {
183                    case PARAMETER -> "doclet.Parameters_warn";
184                    case TYPE_PARAMETER -> "doclet.TypeParameters_warn";
185                    case RECORD_COMPONENT -> "doclet.RecordComponents_warn";
186                    };
187                    if (!writer.configuration()
188                        .isDocLintReferenceGroupEnabled()) {
189                        messages.warning(ch.getDocTreePath(tag), key,
190                            paramName);
191                    }
192                }
193                Integer position = positionOfName.get(name);
194                if (position != null) {
195                    if (tagOfPosition.containsKey(position)) {
196                        String key = switch (kind) {
197                        case PARAMETER -> "doclet.Parameters_dup_warn";
198                        case TYPE_PARAMETER -> "doclet.TypeParameters_dup_warn";
199                        case RECORD_COMPONENT -> "doclet.RecordComponents_dup_warn";
200                        };
201                        if (!writer.configuration()
202                            .isDocLintReferenceGroupEnabled()) {
203                            messages.warning(ch.getDocTreePath(tag), key,
204                                paramName);
205                        }
206                    } else {
207                        tagOfPosition.put(position, tag);
208                    }
209                }
210            }
211        }
212        // Document declared parameters for which tag documentation is available
213        // (either directly or inherited) in order of their declaration.
214        Content result = writer.getOutputInstance();
215        for (int i = 0; i < parameters.size(); i++) {
216            ParamTree tag = tagOfPosition.get(i);
217            if (tag != null) {
218                result.add(convertParam(e, kind, writer, tag,
219                    ch.getParameterName(tag), result.isEmpty()));
220            } else if (writer.configuration().utils.isMethod(e)) {
221                result.add(getInheritedTagletOutput(kind, e, writer,
222                    parameters.get(i), i, result.isEmpty()));
223            }
224        }
225        if (tags.size() > tagOfPosition.size()) {
226            // Generate documentation for remaining tags that do not match a
227            // declared parameter.
228            // These are erroneous but we generate them anyway.
229            for (ParamTree tag : tags) {
230                if (!tagOfPosition.containsValue(tag)) {
231                    result.add(convertParam(e, kind, writer, tag,
232                        ch.getParameterName(tag), result.isEmpty()));
233                }
234            }
235        }
236        return result;
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * Tries to inherit documentation for a specific parameter (element).
241     * If unsuccessful, the returned content is empty.
242     */
243    private Content getInheritedTagletOutput(ParamKind kind,
244            Element holder,
245            TagletWriter writer,
246            Element param,
247            int position,
248            boolean isFirst) {
249        Utils utils = writer.configuration().utils;
250        Content result = writer.getOutputInstance();
251        var r = utils.docFinder().search((ExecutableElement) holder,
252            m -> Result.fromOptional(
253                extract(utils, m, position, kind == ParamKind.TYPE_PARAMETER)))
254            .toOptional();
255        if (r.isPresent()) {
256            String name = kind != ParamKind.TYPE_PARAMETER
257                ? utils.getSimpleName(param)
258                : utils.getTypeName(param.asType(), false);
259            Content content = convertParam(r.get().method, kind, writer,
260                r.get().paramTree, name, isFirst);
261            result.add(content);
262        }
263        return result;
264    }
265
266    private record Documentation(ParamTree paramTree,
267            ExecutableElement method) {
268    }
269
270    private static Optional<Documentation> extract(Utils utils,
271            ExecutableElement method, Integer position, boolean typeParam) {
272        var ch = utils.getCommentHelper(method);
273        List<ParamTree> tags = typeParam
274            ? utils.getTypeParamTrees(method)
275            : utils.getParamTrees(method);
276        List<? extends Element> parameters = typeParam
277            ? method.getTypeParameters()
278            : method.getParameters();
279        var positionOfName = mapNameToPosition(utils, parameters);
280        return tags.stream().filter(
281            t -> position.equals(positionOfName.get(ch.getParameterName(t))))
282            .map(t -> new Documentation(t, method)).findAny();
283    }
284
285    /**
286     * Converts an individual {@code ParamTree} to {@code Content}, which is
287     * prepended with the header if the parameter is first in the list.
288     */
289    private Content convertParam(Element e,
290            ParamKind kind,
291            TagletWriter writer,
292            ParamTree paramTag,
293            String name,
294            boolean isFirstParam) {
295        Content result = writer.getOutputInstance();
296        if (isFirstParam) {
297            result.add(writer.getParamHeader(kind));
298        }
299        result.add(writer.paramTagOutput(e, paramTag, name));
300        return result;
301    }
302}
